website_summaries.verdict: A huge-capacity oil drain pan that is covered and can help save you trips to the recycle center.
pros: Can hold up to 58 quarts of oil
Has wheels to help you move it when it gets heavy
Made from a durable heavy plastic material
Easy to store and easy to use
Works for both large and small jobs
Great for using when you have to change the oil on multiple cars at once
Comes with a drain spout for emptying
cons: The drain hole can be a little small for the flow of the oil drain on some vehicles

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. My work had a couple for our field services. But not enough for all our trucks to have one all at once. Amazon was is the cheapest place I found by at least $20. My only complaint is the drain holes are too small to always keep up with a tractor truck oil drain. 3 minutes with a razor blade and I cut 2 channels(1 between each set of holes) in the drain and it never tries to overflow. Haven't seen one leak from the caps yet either.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised but if you aren't careful a big mess can happen.
customer_reviews.text: It catches and contains oil as it should and seems sturdily built. If you drain something with a large capacity/large drain plug you may need to control the flow somewhat so it doesn't overwhelm the drain pain's capacity to fill. It also can be somewhat challenging to empty but given the cost and it's capacity it is a good value and will work for you if you are careful and work within it's limitations.

customer_reviews.title: Nice but needs tweaks and it's heavy when full.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, especially for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I work for a small moving company (4WeHelp) and we decided we could save a lot of money by changing out own fluids. Since we don't have a bay or lift of any type we needed a drain pan that could fit under a truck and catch 5-7 gallons of fluids. This thing is perfect, we can change two trucks oil before we have to empty it. The drain cap screws on tight and it has wheels and sturdy handles all the way around that makes it easy to move when full. Pros: Easy to use Closes tight Large capacity Wheels and handles make it easy to move Cons: None

product_meta.title: FloTool 42008MI Hopkins 42008 Crude Control Oil Drain Pan - 58 Quart
product_meta.description: Hopkins' FloTool Super Duty Series oil drain pans were developed for high oil capacities. Their leak-proof design creates the best DIY drain on the market. Robust features ensure that the pans have an extended lifetime and eliminate the typical mess that comes from oil changes. This container holds up to 58 quarts of oil with a screw vent for smooth filling and pouring. Four large handle grips create a more convenient ease of carrying and pouring, and they can be stored either upright or flat.
feature_bullets: Mega capacity for multiple oil changes or commercial use
Closed container constructed from heavy duty black plastic
Includes a drain spout for emptying the drain pan
Rugged, durable design for long lasting product use
